record.title:
09:00

We will be arriving in Genoa at 9am, you will be provided with your disembarkation information the evening before.

We will awake to cruising our way to Barcelona where we will arrive at 1pm. This will be the first day of conference.

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium.

08:30 – 10:30

Plenary Conference Sessions will take place in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6.

Keynote speaker: Trend Spotter Daniel Levine

Industry Vision: Managing Political, Economic and Legislative Change

Advantage Vision: Delivering Continued Benefit, Julia Lo Bue-Said

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium.

08:30 – 10:30

Corporate Breakout Insolito Lounge on Deck 7

TMC 20/20 Vision – Progress and Potential

The Missing Link: Have we got (Business Travel) news for you?

Creating the Vision

Leisure Breakout Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6

(Eyes) Open to the Possibilities

You have got to be kidding

Caught on Camera: Vlogging - The director's cut

Seeing the brand benefits

13:00 – 15:00

We will be embarking MSC Fantasia from 1pm. You will be required to check-in by 3pm and we will be setting sail at 5pm.

13:00 – 16:30

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium.

08:00

We will arrive in Palma, breakfast will be available in the Zanzibar buffet restaurant on Deck 14.

08:00 – 16:00

The registration desk will be open at the Atrium.

09:00 – 13:00

Speed-dating will take place on board ship.

Corporate speed dating in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

Leisure speed-dating in L'Africana Buffet Restaurant on Deck 14.

17:30 – 19:00

We will be hosting our ‘Sail Away’ drinks reception on deck 15 in the Zen Bar at 5pm which will provide us with fantastic views of Genoa as we sail away. 

This will be followed by a buffet dinner and drinks in L’Africana on Deck 14. 

The dress code for this evening is smart casual. Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to Advantage.

10:30 – 11:00

Coffee Break for all delegates in Transatlantico on Deck 7.

11:00 – 13:30

Plenary Conference Sessions will take place in the Teatro L’avanguardia on Deck 6.

Bleisurely Futures (Room 101)

Keynote speaker: Chris Hadfield

Conference Reflections, Steven Esom

Conference 2017

10:30 – 11:00

Coffee Break for Corporate Breakout in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7 and for Leisure Breakout in Transatlantico on Deck 7.

11:00 – 13:00

Corporate Breakout Insolito Lounge on Deck 7

TMC 20/20 Vision - Progress and Potential

The Buyer's Perspective: Progress

In the Hot Seat: Buyer Insights

The Perfect TMC: Facing the Challenges

Leisure Breakout Teatro L'avanguardia on Deck 6

(Eyes) Open to the Possibilities

Open to the Possibilities: The importance of partner relationships

Open skies - Local agents - Local airports

Woudl I lie to you? What do you actually know about our industry?

13:00 - 17:00

Lunch at leisure / Free time

We set sail from Palma at 5pm so you will have some time to look around Palma at your leisure. Alternatively you can return to the ship to fully explore it and experience the Aurea Spa, the 4D cinema and the F1 simulator.

17:00 – 18:30

Pre-dinner drinks reception in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

Sponsored by G Adventures.

18:30 – 20:00

Dinner is served – the dress code for this evening is 70’s (your chance to dress up if you wish if not the dress code is smart casual) .

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

Post-dinner drinks reception in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

Sponsored by Trafalgar.

18:30 – 20:00

Gala dinner – the dress code for this evening is Black Tie (tuxedo, dinner jacket or dark suit and tie for gentlemen and formal gown or cocktail dress for ladies).

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

After dinner drinks at leisure.

17:00 – 18:30

Pre-dinner drinks reception in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

Sponsored by Turkish Airlines.

18:30 – 20:00

Dinner – the dress code for this evening is Italian (smart casual). MSC have said that staff generally wear red, green and white but very few customers stick to the theme and it definitely isn’t fancy dress.

Please note all evening dress codes are applicable for all ship guests for these ship wide events, these dress codes are not exclusive to the Advantage Conference.

20:00 onwards

Post-dinner drinks in the Insolito Lounge on Deck 7.

Sponsored by Travel 2.
